synopsis.text: When the Amusement Club stumbles upon camping gear in their clubroom, they seize the opportunity to embark on a summer adventure in the mountains. Joined by members of the student council, the group sets out for a weekend of fun and excitement. After a day filled with cooking curry under the open sky, the girls engage in a thrilling test of courage, forming pairs to face their fears. To cap off their wilderness experience, they unwind in a soothing bathhouse. This unforgettable camping trip is a testament to the Amusement Club's commitment to making the most of their time together, and a perfect way to savor the joys of summer.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
